title: My Summoner is Gone
body:
I just downloaded the League of legends NA again after maybe 3 years when i logged in its asking for input new summoner...
after input new name my old summoner is gone can i get back my old summoner?
Old : Kamuishirou33
New : Xylonites
server : Na
thanks before

replies.body:
We can help with this!  However, it doesn't look like the old Summoner Name is "gone".  Are you looking to just recover the old account or would you rather keep playing on this new account and do a name swap?  We can help either way as long as you're the creator of both accounts.

Just go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let us know what you'd like to do :D
This question is invalid as summoners are no longer canon in the lore.

im sorry its actualy my bad i logged in on my other account as refferal way back then it has similiar username. 
i able to login to actual account now.
im sorry Riot :)

im using same Username / Account it just when i logged in it asking for new summoner and i lost everything i started at level 1 and such.i want to recover my old account level skin and champs.
can u tell me which category should i submit ticket to?i already submit one on "i have question about league of legends/riot games"

thanks for fast reply though! :)
